name: Soundscapes
description:
We try to convey the feeling of nothing by presenting the
player with a blank black screen.

As the player discovers new sounds, he can mount an
image in his mind.

Based on "Spot the differences" but using only sounds

Game developed for Ludum Dare 45 - October 2019
Theme: "Start With Nothing"

How to Play 🎮

• Move mouse and click when you find a
sound difference between the two panels

Credits ⚒️

• Euler Moises: Sound Designer 🎼 / Art 🎨

• Kaish: Programming ⌨️
